title: Memorials of his time,
author: Cockburn, Henry Cockburn
snippet: Mine was the left flank company of the " Western Battalion of Midlothian Volunteers." John A. Murray s company was the right flank one ; and as these two were both from the parish of St. Cuthberts, the rest being scattered over the county, we always drilled together.

title: Story of a Stolen Heir. A novel
author: Bertram, James Glass.
snippet: " The marriage ceremony was conducted" in the Presbyterian form; the Rev. Dr." Paul, the minister of St. Cuthberts, being" the officiating clergyman, and, although" rather unusual, it was solemnised at the" home of the bridegroom, instead of that
